message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to purchase a unique and valuable product. I'm looking for a serious buyer who can appreciate its worth, and I think you might be the one. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1200000. If you're interested, please let me know, and we can discuss the details. If not, I have another buyer lined up who is willing to pay the minimum of $1000000, so it's a win-win either way!
